p3.title: AuthFlowAPI - Complete Authentication Solution with Node.js
p3.description: A comprehensive RESTful API for user login, registration, and CRUD operations. The project implements critical security features such as password hashing (bcrypt) and request rate-limiting to prevent brute-force attacks. Its extensive automated test coverage guarantees code reliability and maintainability, delivering a high-performance and secure application.
